text: The Super League is a rugby league competition for clubs from the United Kingdom and France. The league started in 1996 and Wigan Warriors are the current champions, having won the 2016 title. ==Current teams== *Castleford Tigers *Catalans Dragons *Huddersfield Giants *Hull F.C. *Leigh Centurions *Leeds Rhinos *Salford Red Devils *St Helens R.F.C. *Wakefield Trinity *Warrington Wolves *Widnes Vikings *Wigan Warriors ==Former teams== *Bradford Bulls *Hull Kingston Rovers *London Broncos *Newcastle Thunder *North Wales Crusaders *Sheffield Eagles *Workington Town ==Winners== *Leeds Rhinos (7): 2004, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2011, 2012 and 2015 *St Helens (6): 1996, 1999, 2000, 2002, 2006 and 2014 *Bradford (4): 1997, 2001, 2003 and 2005 *Wigan (4): 1998, 2010, 2013 and 2016 Category:Rugby league
title: Super League
